item.title: Ensemble Learning
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This article is a summary of the StatQuest video made by Josh Starmer. Click here to see the video explained by Josh Starmer. The Boosting and Ensemble Learning concepts can be applied to many Machine Learning models: it is a Meta Algorithm used to convert many weak learners into a strong learner in order to achieve good performance in supervised problems.
